channel.title: Friends can't connect to my server
channel.description: Hi, I downloaded a server off of the moparscape download section and I also downloaded the client that came with it. So I went into client.java and changed the no-ip.org from the the owners no- ip to my no-ip. Then I sent my friend the client I had downloaded and I had my server running and my no-ip running, but when he tries to connect it says error connecting to server. I have done portforwarding but am not so sure it has worked correctly, plead help. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2009, 10:36:24 pm[/size][hr]Please help.

item.title: Friends can't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

freakinlost:

you need to portforward and zerogordo gave you links use them if you don’t know how to do it.

Nobody ever uses the search button you don’t even have to know anything about this website. All you have to do is tell them to use the search button

Read full topic

item.title: Friends can't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

Seriously, you should probably try http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html that will show you all of it. For the server you should probably try http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html. If not theres always the http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search. Hope this helped and then you and your friends can play with you.

Hi, I downloaded a server off of the moparscape download section and I also downloaded the client that came with it. So I went into client.java and changed the no-ip.org from the the owners no- ip to my no-ip. Then I sent my friend the client I had downloaded and I had my server running and my no-ip running, but when he tries to connect it says error connecting to server.
